department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: Supplemental security and thermal moderation window blinds B2
description: The Department of National Defence (DND) requires supplemental security and thermal moderation window blinds for the upper floor of MB-51 located at CFB Kingston ON.
full_summary:
Title: MB-51 Security and Thermal Moderation Window Blinds

### Overview

The Department of National Defence (DND) has a requirement for supplemental security and thermal moderation window blinds for the upper floor of MB-51, located at CFB Kingston, Ontario. This procurement includes the delivery, installation, and training for the required window blinds.

### Procurement Details

* **Procurement ID**: WS3277836036-Doc3619268386
* **Amendment**: 5
* **Publication Date**: August 10, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: September 22, 2022, 2:00 PM EDT
* **Amendment Date**: September 9, 2022

### Selection Criteria

* The winner will be chosen based on the lowest price.

### Tender Process

This procurement is a public tender process, open to all qualified bidders. All submitted bids must meet the minimum requirements outlined in the tender documents.

### Essential Details

* **Region of Delivery**: Ontario (excluding the National Capital Region)
* **End User**: Department of National Defence
* **Delivery Address**: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada

### Contracting Entity

* **Name**: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
* **Address**: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, QC K1A 0S5, Canada

### Contact Information

* **Name**: Vashti Ramnarine (SPAC/PSPC)
* **Email**: [vashti.ramnarine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:vashti.ramnarine@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* **Phone**: None
* **Fax**: None

### Additional Information

The tender documents can be accessed through the Ministry of Public Works and Government Services (MPWGS) online procurement portal. Successful bidders will be notified via email and will be required to submit all necessary documents and evidence as part of the contract process. The contract is expected to begin on or before December 31, 2022.

### Viewing the Tender

The procurement information is available at the following URL: [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/13804191?extsite=MTM4MDQxOTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com
